# [[nature]]

====Usage notes====
This term is often used in the expression {{furigana|得体の知れない|えたいのしれない}} ''etai no shirenai'', "of an unknown nature," more naturally translated as "[[mysterious]]," "[[nondescript]]," or "[[strange]]."
